title: Superman: Doom in a Box
description: When Clark Kent receives an action figure of Doomsday, it seems like a harmless toy. But soon enough, Clark realizes that this harmless action figure is actually a creator of destruction. As water makes Doomsday grow larger and larger, he becomes unstoppable and the city is threatened. So to save the city from devastation, Superman must act to save the day.
author: Brent Sudduth
